<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H5338|נְצַל]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצַל‎</span><sub>212</sub> **verb** not in **Qal; Pi\`el** ==strip, plunder==; **Niph\`al** ==deliver oneself, be delivered==; **Hiph\`il** ==snatch away, deliver== (Ecclus Hiph\`il Participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצלת‎</span> ***delivering***  (Levi conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יציל‎</span> [[Eccl.40.24|Eccl 40:24]]a)); Late Hebrew Hiph\`il = Biblical Hebrew; Biblical Aramaic Haph\`el ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pour out***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> intransitive ***tincturam exuit emisitque*** barba, ex cuspide ***excidit*** sagitta, etc., [[BDB#Kam|Kam]] [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]; Ethiopic III. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***evulsum*** or ***abruptum excidere e suo loco***, [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>698</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצַּלְנוּ‎</span> [[Jer.7.10|Jer 7:10]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּצֵל‎</span> [[Deut.23.16|Deut 23:16]], + 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִנָָּֽצְלָה‎</span> [[Ps.69.15|Ps 69:15]], + 8 t. Imperfect; ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנָּצֵל‎</span> [[Isa.20.6|Isa 20:6]] + 3 t. — 

**1.** reflexive ***tear oneself away, deliver oneself:*** absolute [[Prov.6.3|Prov 6:3]]; [[Ezek.14.16|Ezek 14:16]]; [[Ezek.14.18|Ezek 14:18]]; [[2Kgs.19.11|2Kgs 19:11]] = [[Isa.37.11|Isa 37:11]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּד‎</span> [[Prov.6.5|Prov 6:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעִ ֗֗֗ אֶל‎</span> ***escape from-unto*** [[Deut.23.16|Deut 23:16]]. 

**2.** passive, ***be torn, out or away*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפִּי הָאֲרִי‎</span> [[Amos.3.12|Amos 3:12]] ***be delivered***, absolute [[Gen.32.31|Gen 32:31]]; [[Jer.7.10|Jer 7:10]]; [[Ps.33.16|Ps 33:16]]; [[Mic.4.30|Mic 4:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> [[Isa.20.6|Isa 20:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכַּף‎</span> [[Hab.2.9|Hab 2:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Ps.69.15|Ps 69:15]].

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצַּלְתֶּם‎</span> [[Exod.3.22|Exod 3:22]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַצֵּל‎</span> [[Ezek.14.14|Ezek 14:14]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***strip of, spoil***, absolute [[2Chr.20.25|2Chr 20:25]] with accusative of person [[Exod.3.22|Exod 3:22]]; [[Exod.12.36|Exod 12:36]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** ***deliver***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשָׁם‎</span> [[Ezek.14.14|Ezek 14:14]].

**Hiph\`il**<sub>190</sub> ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִּיל‎</span> [[Exod.12.27|Exod 12:27]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצַּ֫לְתָּ‎</span> [[Exod.5.23|Exod 5:23]] + 50 t. Perfect; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַּצִּיל‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.39|2Kgs 17:39]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצֵּל‎</span> [[Gen.31.9|Gen 31:9]] + 63 t. Imperfect; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצֵּל‎</span> [[Prov.24.11|Prov 24:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצִּ֫ילָה‎</span> [[Ps.22.21|Ps 22:21]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצִּילֵנִי‎</span> [[Gen.32.12|Gen 32:12]] + 24 t. Imperative; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצֵּל‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.30|2Kgs 18:30]] + 4 t.; ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצִּיל‎</span> [[Gen.37.22|Gen 37:22]] + 23 t. Infinitive; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצִּיל‎</span> [[Deut.32.39|Deut 32:39]] + 16 t. Participle — 

**1.** ***take away, snatch away***, e.g. property [[Gen.31.9|Gen 31:9]]; [[Gen.31.10|Gen 31:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Hos.2.11|Hos 2:11]], prey from the mouth of animals [[1Sam.17.35|1Sam 17:35]]; [[Amos.3.12|Amos 3:12]]; [[Ezek.34.10|Ezek 34:10]], words of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> from the mouth [[Ps.119.43|Ps 119:43]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֵין מַצִּיל בֵּינֵיהֶם‎</span> [[2Sam.14.6|2Sam 14:6]] ***and there was none to tear them apart*** (two fighting); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵנוּ וְהִצִּיל‎</span> [[2Sam.20.6|2Sam 20:6]] ***and take away our eye*** (elude our sight, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]; [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#We|We]] after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] ***cast shadow*** over our eye, denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֵל‎</span> [[BDB#Bö|Bö]] [[BDB#The|Th]] after [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] ***tear away*** our eye, harm us irretrievably, see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>18 26. 2</sup>.; [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] ***escape from us*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמֶּנּוּ‎</span>, as [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup>], compare [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִצַּל‎</span>]). 

**2.** rescue, recover, ***e.g.*** cities [[Judg.11.26|Judg 11:26]] wives and property [[1Sam.30.8|1Sam 30:8]]; [[1Sam.30.18|1Sam 30:18]]; [[1Sam.30.22|1Sam 30:22]]. 

**3.** ***deliver from:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***enemies and troubles***, absolute [[1Sam.12.21|1Sam 12:21]]; [[Prov.19.19|Prov 19:19]]; [[Isa.50.2|Isa 50:2]]; [[Jer.39.17|Jer 39:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵין מַצִּיל‎</span> [[Judg.18.28|Judg 18:28]]; [[Job.5.4|Job 5:4]]; [[Job.10.7|Job 10:7]]; [[Ps.7.3|Ps 7:3]]; [[Ps.50.22|Ps 50:22]]; [[Ps.71.11|Ps 71:11]]; [[Isa.5.29|Isa 5:29]]; [[Isa.42.22|Isa 42:22]]; [[Isa.43.13|Isa 43:13]];  [[Hos.5.14|Hos 5:14]]; [[Mic.5.7|Mic 5:7]] with accusative [[Gen.18.8|Gen 18:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.5.23|Exod 5:23]]; [[Exod.12.27|Exod 12:27]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.23.15|Deut 23:15]] + 39 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצִּיל נַפְשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.44.20|Isa 44:20]]; [[Isa.47.14|Isa 47:14]]; [[Ezek.3.19|Ezek 3:19]]; [[Ezek.3.21|Ezek 3:21]]; [[Ezek.14.20|Ezek 14:20]]; [[Ezek.33.19|Ezek 33:19]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> ***from*** [[Mic.5.6|Mic 5:6]] + 25 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּד‎</span> ***from the hand or power of*** [[Gen.32.12|Gen 32:12]]; [[Exod.2.19|Exod 2:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) + 57 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת יַד‎</span> [[Exod.18.10|Exod 18:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכַּף‎</span> [[2Sam.14.16|2Sam 14:16]]; [[2Sam.19.10|2Sam 19:10]]; [[2Sam.22.1|2Sam 22:1]] = [[Ps.18.1|Ps 18:1]], [[2Kgs.20.6|2Kgs 20:6]] = [[Isa.38.6|Isa 38:6]]; [[2Chr.32.11|2Chr 32:11]]; [[Ezra.8.31|Ezra 8:31]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***from death*** [[Prov.11.16|Prov 11:16]]; [[Prov.12.6|Prov 12:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמּוֺת‎</span> [[Josh.2.13|Josh 2:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Ps.33.19|Ps 33:19]]; [[Ps.56.14|Ps 56:14]]; [[Prov.10.12|Prov 10:12]] = [[Prov.11.4|Prov 11:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְּׁאוֺל‎</span> [[Ps.86.13|Ps 86:13]]; [[Prov.23.14|Prov 23:14]]. 

**4.** ***deliver from sin and guilt*** (in late writings), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכָּלפְּֿשָׁעַי‎</span> [[Ps.39.9|Ps 39:9]] ***from all my trangression***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדָּמִים‎</span> [[Ps.51.6|Ps 51:6]] ***from bloodguiltiness***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצִּילֵנוּ וְכַפֵּר עַלחַֿטּאֹתֵינוּ‎</span> [[Ps.79.9|Ps 79:9]] ***deliver us and cover over all our sins***; probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּאִמְרָֽתְךָ הַצִּילֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.170|Ps 119:170]].

**Hoph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֻצּל‎</span>; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּאוּד מֻצָּל מִשְּׂרֵטָה‎</span> [[Amos.4.11|Amos 4:11]] ***as a brand plucked out of the burning***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֵשׁ‎</span> [[Zech.3.2|Zech 3:2]] ***from the fire.***

**Hithpa\`el** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְנַצְּלוּ אֶתעֶֿדְיָם‎</span> [[Exod.33.6|Exod 33:6]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***and they stripped themselves*** of their ornaments.
